Small Parts¶

JellyBean¶

class pcbdl.small_parts.JellyBean(value=None, refdes=None, package=None, part_number=None, populated=True, reversed=False, to=None)[source]¶

Bases: pcbdl.base.Part

2 pin Jelly Bean components.

The main attraction to subclass this is because of the to= argument, it’s very easy to chain connections with such a part because its pins are pretty flexible therefore easy tochoose automatically.

PINS = [('P1', '1'), ('P2', '2')]¶
UNITS = ''¶
get_pin_to_connect(pin_type, net=None)[source]¶
